name: Search Initiatives
overview:
Search Initiatives, LLC is a leading provider of search-driven lead generation solutions for small to mid-sized businesses in the U.S. Since its inception in 2006, we have built one of the largest customer bases in the local advertising market. We provide easy and affordable solutions for SMBs and Partnership programs that are looking to improve their web presence without the need for a website or large marketing budget.

Search Initiatives,LLC has developed a highly effective technology solution to bring customers to local businesses through Local Search. The solution produces search engine visibility in the organic results section of search engine results pages and those results drive calls and leads to local advertisers. At the core of our platform is our automated content engine (Found Fast Technology) which takes basic information about a business to create highly optimized marketing profiles specifically tailored for search engines. We create customized content for our clients and that blend of customized and automated content within our platform produces dramatic results for our clients.

We have successfully deployed our solution to a very large number of SMBs directly and have contracted with partners to deploy its platform across up to one million additional local businesses.

Search Initiatives owns and operates a portfolio of online properties that harness the power of the Internet to help small to medium-sized businesses market their products and services.

The company generates accurate and useful information about these businesses to improve search engine visibility and optimize consumer impact. Search Initiatives’ properties include eLocal Listing, MyLocally, eLocal Profiles, cherrp, and RadarFrog.
